name: AVAREN
overview:
Avaren is a Dallas-Fort Worth IT solutions company made up of veteran computer consultants offering unmatched IT support, computer repair and networking services. Call 214-379-4200 to talk to an experienced network engineer. We can help your small-to-medium size business with computer repair, network security, cabling and installation, server configuration, management and monitoring, data recovery & backup plans and more in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex.

AVAREN INC Veterans of big business and govt. We specialize in redundant systems Server engineers of the highest level Vast HP/Dell/IBM experience Vast MS/Exchange/IIS experience Lock in your IT budget Founded in 2002
